description: This table contains information documented during a patient's periodontal exam, such as probing depths or gingival margin readings.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROBE_DEPTH
columns.description: Stores the probing depth measurements (in millimeters) taken for a tooth during a periodontal exam

columns.name: DENTAL_GING_MARGIN
columns.description: Stores the gingival margin measurements (in millimeters) taken for a tooth during a periodontal exam

columns.name: DENT_PERIO_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the location of various periodontal data points.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Facial Distal


Facial


Facial Mesial


Lingual Mesial


Lingual


Lingual Distal


Facial Side


Lingual Side

columns.name: DENTAL_CLIN_ATT_LVL
columns.description: Stores the clinical attachment level measurements (in millimeters) taken for a tooth during a periodontal exam
